member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.AddFileLine(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Adds a line to local Log file, with:
Timestamp
Plate Height (mm),
Load (N),
Current (mA),
Encoder Counts (cts)
target Current (mA),
target Current Tolerance (mA),
Movement Direction (string)
sending to serial stream (bool)
Mode of Operation (string)

member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.SendSerialData
member.summary:
Sends info over serial:
Timestamp
Serial Word (Flags)
Plate Height
Load (min of 0??)

member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.CreateFile
member.summary: Save time-stamped file to memory with all current variables and constants.
member.remarks: ( Good to have saved in case of loss of power or state errors )

member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.ManualPanelState(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables/Disables all components of Manual Panel (left side) with supplied boolean

member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.RemotePanelState(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables/Disables all components of Remote Panel (right side) with supplied boolean

member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.SetMode(System.String)
member.summary: Highlight UI element for current type of movement

member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.GetTargetCurrentperLoadmA(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Calculates required "Motor Current per Load" based on motor's present Encoder Count. (Motor Current required to apply a given HoldForce changes based on plate's height.)
member.remarks: MotorCurrentTarget = K * SetLoad * (b3(Counts^3) + b2(Counts^2)+ b1(Counts) + a)

member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.GetPlateHeight(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Calculates Plate Height from Encoder Count

member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.GetEncoderPosition(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Calculates Encoder Count (cts) from Plate Height (mm or 0.1 mm?) (distraction)

member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.CalculateLoadAtCurrent(System.Decimal,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Calculates HoldForce of Load on plates using Motor Current and Encoder Counts

member.summary: Set Motor Controller to Current Mode, and control with given Current

member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.CheckForPause
member.summary: If OperationStatus is "Pause", wait in 1 second increments

member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.SetMoveParameter
member.summary: Set Motor Controller to Profile Positiion Mode, and set its parameters for velocity, acceleration, and deceleration

member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.MoveToPosition(System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves to relative position by amount specified (as opposed to absolute postion via MoveToPositionABS)
member.remarks: Combine with ABS, add bool param for absolute

member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.MoveToPositionABS(System.Int32)
member.summary: Move to absolute position on encoder (as opposed to relative postion via MoveToPosition)
member.remarks: Combine into other, add bool param for absolute

member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.OperationCycle
member.summary: ONLY used for Seek() and HoldForce Operations [ HoldForce(), RampedForce(), LoadOperation() ]

member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.CollapsePlates
member.summary: Closes plates using ClosingCurrent(-150 mA)

member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.LoadOperation
member.summary: [Bad Function / FACTORY MODE] "Load Hold" Operation
member.remarks: - exactly the same as Load(), but compares MyTargetForce to CCurrent (instantaneous Current) instead of LoadCurrentN (Load HoldForce calc'd from Current) - not currently used by any modes, only internal use

member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.Seek
member.summary: Extra function to start Seek without entering full operational mode

member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.HoldForce
member.summary: Seek Force

member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.HoldDistance(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Seek Distance

member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.RampForce(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Increments position in steps until Load matches or exceeds target force ( Parameter MyTargetForce is overwritten without being used )

member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.RampDistance(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Increments position in steps until Position matches or exceeds target position

member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.CheckMaxForce
member.summary: Safety check that verifies current load is within limit
member.remarks:
If load is above limit
Output safety warning to terminal.
Move down to predefined position or by predefined amount.
Temp Pause reading Motor current, either for current protection or avoid bad reading feedback.

member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.MoveToHomeZero
member.summary: Moves to absolute encoder position 0 (As calibrated with Homing)

member.summary: (Inteneded to) Move to "Start Height" set in Manual Jon menu
member.remarks: (Not actually called by "Move To Start Height" button BtnMtEZ_Click )

member.name: M:KMX_TB_PRG_001.Form1.RemoteDistance
member.summary: (Inteneded to) Move to "HoldDistance" set in Manual Jog menu.
member.remarks: (Not actually called by "Move To HoldDistance" button BtnMtD_Click )
